name: job-seeker
description: Scan google email box for job mails, visit the job description page and find out, if the job matches my skills. If yes, mark the mail as important

scripts.dev: concurrently -n redis,worker,serve -c blue,yellow,green "docker-compose up" "NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -- tsx watch src/worker.ts" "NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -- tsx watch src/server.ts"
scripts.start: concurrently -n redis,worker,serve -c blue,yellow,green "docker-compose up" "NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -- tsx src/worker.ts" "NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -- tsx src/server.ts"
scripts.serve:dev: NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -- tsx watch src/server.ts
